best_match.title: R. Strauss: Also sprach Zarathustra, Op. 30: I. Prelude. Sonnenaufgang

match_score.reasoning: The soundtrack metadata specifies 'Also Sprach Zarathustra' from 'Toy Story 2'. The iconic segment of this piece used in movies like 'Toy Story 2' (and '2001: A Space Odyssey') is the 'Sunrise' (Einleitung) prelude. Candidate 4 is the strongest match because its title explicitly identifies this specific section as 'I. Prelude. Sonnenaufgang', confirming it is the correct musical segment. The duration of 1 minute and 50 seconds perfectly aligns with the length of this prelude. Furthermore, the video is provided by Universal Music Group and features the Berliner Philharmoniker conducted by Herbert von Karajan, signifying a highly authentic, professional, and canonical recording of the piece, ensuring high audio quality and a definitive performance. While the soundtrack metadata lists the performer as 'Unknown', this video offers a widely recognized and high-quality performance of the piece, which is the best alternative when the exact movie recording's performer is not specified or easily identifiable. None of the candidate videos explicitly mention 'Toy Story 2', making Candidate 4 the best representation of the musical content itself.
